attributes.action: force doctors practices to allocate appointments in advance and not force vulnerable patients to ring up in the morning to request an appointment for that day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present a number of doctors practices force patients to ring up in the morning to book an appointment that day. Most appointments are booked up within half an hour. The only way you can pre book is four weeks in advance. This is wrong and puts a lot of stress on chronically ill patients.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoGPappointment/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
